ä½ æ™‚é–“åŒæ¯”æ•¸åˆå””è¬›æ˜ æ“ºæ˜ä¿‚æƒ³èª¤å°äººç¾æ–¯ä¿‚æˆå ´æ•£æ­¥

äººåœ°ä»²è¦béšŠ

Dani Alves: "If I had been treated as I thought I deserved, I would have continued at Barça until today. It is a club that I love, and that I consider my home."

"I offered to return to Barça. I went to Juventus to show that I still had the level, I wanted to go back, and Barça needed me. I would have come free, no transfer, but they had no balls to acknowledge that they had been wrong."

"I'm not throwing stones at anyone, but I think the management was prostituting themselves. It may be that the president was ill-advised, I'm not saying it was just Bartomeu's fault."

"I think Barça want to be now a commercial team, a buying - selling club. And so you lose your identity. I think that is Barça's problem."

"Barça is changing the philosophy of the club, it is normal that they have problems. For me they have lost a little identity, and now they have to go through a hard process to recover it."

"I follow all Barça games. I like them occasionally, but not in general, because they have individualities but no identity."

"Neymar? All the players who leave Barça end up regretting leaving. I don’t know what he thinks now, but I’d love for him to come back."

quote.msg:
Dani Alves: "If I had been treated as I thought I deserved, I would have continued at Barça until today. It is a club that I love, and that I consider my home."

"I offered to return to Barça. I went to Juventus to show that I still had the level, I wanted to go back, and Barça needed me. I would have come free, no transfer, but they had no balls to acknowledge that they had been wrong."

"I'm not throwing stones at anyone, but I think the management was prostituting themselves. It may be that the president was ill-advised, I'm not saying it was just Bartomeu's fault."

"I think Barça want to be now a commercial team, a buying - selling club. And so you lose your identity. I think that is Barça's problem."

"Barça is changing the philosophy of the club, it is normal that they have problems. For me they have lost a little identity, and now they have to go through a hard process to recover it."

"I follow all Barça games. I like them occasionally, but not in general, because they have individualities but no identity."

"Neymar? All the players who leave Barça end up regretting leaving. I don’t know what he thinks now, but I’d love for him to come back."
